panels.description: Result of the last scale operation.
panels.title: Last scale result

panels.description: Whether or not cluster is healthy enough for autoscaling. 1 if it is, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: Safe to scale

panels.description: Number of unschedulable ("Pending") pods in the cluster.
panels.title: Unscheduled pods

panels.description: Whether or not the scale down is in cooldown. 1 if its, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: ScaleDown cooldown

panels.description: kube_node_labels needs   --metric-labels-allowlist=nodes=[*] (https://github.com/prometheus-community/helm-charts/blob/3aa3bbb4815854836033f42ff7fc41ed27d2904d/charts/kube-state-metrics/values.yaml#L357)
panels.title: Node distribution by AZ

panels.description: Current total nodes and available nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Nodes available

panels.description: Number of nodes currently considered unneeded by CA.
panels.title: Uneeded nodes

panels.description: Maximum number of nodes allowed in all nodepools. Be warned this value comes from nodepools and not from CA "maxNodesTotal".
panels.title: Max nodes

panels.description: Number of nodes that haven't been removed or aborted after finished scale-down phase. https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/blob/08e72509a30929a4f32ea83b14b79e510c4e80d1/cluster-autoscaler/core/scaledown/unneeded/nodes.go#L144
panels.title: Pending node deletion

panels.description: Numebr of nodepools managed by CA.
panels.title: Nodepools

panels.description: Last time when the CA removed node from the cluster.

defaults.noValue: No scale events in this range

panels.title: Last time the cluster scaled down

panels.description: Last time when the CA added node to the cluster.

defaults.noValue: No scale events in this range

panels.title: Last time the cluster scaled up

panels.description: It is important to know when the current CA instance started. Counter based metrics will reset at that time like scaled_up_nodes_total and scaled_down_nodes_total
panels.title: CA instance start time

panels.description: Percentage of requested memory / sum of cluster memory.
panels.title: Allocated memory % in cluster

panels.description: Percentage of requested vCPU / sum of cluster vCPU.
panels.title: Allocated vCPU % in cluster

panels.description: Current, requested and maximum(memoryTotal) memory of the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster memory

panels.description: Current, requested and maximum(coresTotal) vCPU of the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster vCPU

panels.description: Current nodes count and the maximum number of nodes allowed by nodepools.
panels.title: Total nodes

panels.description: Number of unschedulable ("Pending") pods in the cluster.
panels.title: Unscheduled pods

panels.description: Nodes added and removed by CA.
panels.title: CA scaling hearthbeat ( will reset on CA restarts )

panels.description: Number of pods evicted by CA.
panels.title: Evicted pods

panels.description: Current state of the cluster has been updated, started autoscaling logic.
panels.title: Last autoscale function activity

panels.description: Autoscaler will check if scale up is necessary.
panels.title: Last scaleUP function

panels.description: Autoscaler will try to scale down some nodes.
panels.title: Last scaleDown function
